patterns: How do I know my learning type?
Is there a test to find my learning style?
Can I take a test to know my learning type?
responses: You can take our initial learning type test to determine whether you're a Visual, Auditory, or Written learner by visiting the 'Learning Type Test' section.

patterns: How do I track my progress?
Can I see my learning progress?
How can I check my progress?
What progress metrics do you offer?
responses: You can track your progress through detailed metrics provided in your dashboard, which include skill mastery, test scores, and course completion rates.
Our platform offers metrics based on Bayesian Knowledge Tracing (BKT) and Item Response Theory (IRT) to give a clear view of your learning journey.

patterns: How do I create a course?
How can I add a course?
What tools are available for course creation?
responses: Yes! Educators can create online courses through our intuitive course creation tool, where you can add content, quizzes, and track student progress.
You can create courses by accessing the 'Educator Dashboard' and using our course creation tool to design custom learning experiences.

patterns: How does the platform adjust difficulty?
Does the difficulty adapt to my learning?
responses: Yes, our platform uses algorithms like BKT and IRT to adjust the difficulty of the content in real time, based on your performance and learning pace.
Course difficulty will automatically adjust as you progress, making the content easier or more challenging based on your understanding.

You can contact us via email at contact@adaptivelearning.com or call us at +123-456-7890.

patterns: What features does this platform offer?

responses: This platform offers adaptive learning, personalized course creation, real-time progress tracking, and dynamic difficulty adjustments using advanced algorithms like BKT and IRT.
Our platform allows educators to create online courses, and students can learn at their own pace with automatic difficulty adjustments.
